name: v0.5.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Remove `is_same_structure` from `structure` lib. by @copybara-service[bot] in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/219
* Update the versions of the GitHub actions used. by @copybara-service[bot] in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/231
* Update the `disk-cache` key to ensure that job caches are isolated. by @copybara-service[bot] in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/233
* Update the requirements to the latest versions for the existing requirements. by @copybara-service[bot] in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/268
* Update requirements to include the latest versions of `ml_dtypes`. by @copybara-service[bot] in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/267
* Align the protobuf version between the requirements and the pyproject.toml. by @copybara-service[bot] in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/269
* Format the `pyproject.toml` file. by @copybara-service[bot] in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/270
* Increment the version to `0.5.0`. by @copybara-service[bot] in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/271


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

name: v0.4.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Remove unsused `get_proto` from `ConcreteComputation` by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/99
* Update the BCR presubmit platform from `macos` to `macos_arm64`. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/98
* Remove deprecated `ComputationBuildingBlock.proto` method. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/97
* Renamed `function_utils.is_signature_compatible_with_types` and `function_utils.is_argument_struct` to private, as they're not intended to be public. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/106
* Cleanup utilities within context stack to reduce API surface. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/103
* Fix typing issue introduced by cl/735743912 by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/107
* Add an example computation and execution context. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/100
* Consistently document/access the numpy values Federated Language supports. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/115
* Capitalize Markdown callouts in federated_language. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/117
* Clean up the type annotations and documention for the Python examples. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/112
* Remove "TFF" from some `federated_language` files. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/120
* Remove generic parameterization of computation in execution contexts. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/122
* Remove "TFF" and "TensorFlow" from `value_impl.py`. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/119
* Remove "TFF" from intrinsics.py. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/118
* Remove final "TFF" strings from `federated_language`. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/121
* Fix and remove runtime type checks for private functions and tests. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/125
* Remove generic parameterization of computation in execution contexts. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/123
* Remove unused code in `async_execution_context`. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/128
* Remove base interface for context stack. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/116
* Remove unnecessary runtime type checks already covered by Python type annotations. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/124
* Fix and remove runtime type checks from the `federated_context` package. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/127
* Add python type annotations for the `execution_contexts` package. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/129
* Add python type annotations for the `cardinalities_utils` module. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/131
* Add python type annotations for the `execution_contexts` package. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/130
* Add python type annotations for the `cardinalities_utils` module. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/137
* Remove unnecessary CompilerPipeline abstraction. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/105
* Add python type annotations for the `compiler` package. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/138
* Remove `pytype` disable directives. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/139
* Delete unused functions. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/140
* Merge the `execution_contexts` and `executors` packages. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/141
* Remove unused functions in `py_typecheck` module. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/158
* Remove unnecessary usage of `structure.Struct` from the `transformation_utils` module. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/162
* Add `fields` method to `federated_language.StructType` to reduce usage of the functions in the `structure` module. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/164
* Reduce usage of usage of the functions in the `structure` module from within the `building_blocks` module. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/165
* Remove unnecessary usage of `structure.Struct` from the `type_conversions` module. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/163
* Remove unnecessary usage of `structure` module. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/170
* Add testing for the examples to the tools-related tests. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/176
* Give the pip `hub_name` a unique name so Federated Language can be used by downstream projects more easily. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/178
* Add testing for the examples to the tools-related tests. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/179
* Remove unused `tff.structure` API. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/184
* Update links in the Federated Language project license headers to HTTPS and normalize the whitespace. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/190
* Remove unused `structure.to_odict()` API. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/191
* Remove unused `structure.to_odict()` API. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/193
* Remove `structure.hash_field()`, this is now easy to check because `StructType.fields()` exists. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/192
* Increment the version to `0.4.0`. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/199


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/compare/v0.3.1...v0.4.0

name: v0.3.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Internal by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/56
* Remove `federated_langauge.framework.global_context_stack`, use `federated_langauge.framework.get_context_stack()` instead. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/57
* Removes `federated_language.framework.type_to_non_all_equal`, instead use the `federated_language.FederatedType` constructor. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/64
* Remove equality-related API, use Python equality operators instead. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/66
* Remove `tff.test.create_runtime_error_context`, use `federated_language.framework.RuntimeErrorContext` instead. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/67
* Remove `tff.test.assert_type_assignable_from`, use `federated_language.Type.is_assignable_from` instead. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/68
* Remove `tff.test.assert_types_equivalent`, use `federated_language.Type.is_equivalent_to` instead. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/69
* Avoid alias imports. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/72
* Remove fixed TODO. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/74
* Simplify some python modules. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/75
* Simplify type-related errors. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/76
* Removes unnecessary abstract class and some dead code. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/77
* Cleanup for ComputationBuildingBlocks. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/78
* Deprecate `ComputationBuildingBlock.proto`, use `ComputationBuildingBlock.to_proto()` instead. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/80
* Remove dead code and inline functions. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/82
* Add tools for supporting Python 3.12 and Python 3.13. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/92
* Increment the version to `0.3.0`. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/93


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

name: v0.2.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update release to publish to PyPI instead of TestPyPI. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/22
* Set Bazel module `version` and `compatibility_level`. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/25
* Add license header to BUILD files. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/27
* Normalize python import. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/28
* Fix some lint errors. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/30
* Fix some formatting issues. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/31
* Remove old and already addressed TODOs. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/32
* Add configuration to automate publishing to BCR. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/33
* Add license header to BUILD files. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/35
* Update the release to upload a release archive instead of the source and build distributions for the GitHub release. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/26
* Fix spacing in pydocs. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/37
* Update GitHub workflow to cache pip resources. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/38
* Move documentation to Federated Language from TensorFlow Federated. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/39
* Internal by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/43
* Remove `federated_language.framework.(deserialize_type|serialize_type)`, use `federated_language.Types.(from_proto|to_proto)` instead. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/40
* Move the TensorFlow-compatible type functions out of the public API of federated_language. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/44
* Remove functions to build type-related error messages. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/45
* Add `from_proto` and `to_proto` methods to `ConcreteComputation`. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/48
* Remove `federated_language.framework.(deserialize_computation|serialize_computation)`, use `federated_language.framework.ConcreteComputation.(from_proto|to_proto)` instead: by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/47
* Update requirements and dependency to use the older version of protobuf. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/52
* Increment the version to `0.2.0`. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/55


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

name: v0.1.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Move `.bazelversion` to the root of the repository. by @michaelreneer in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/2
* Add GitHub action to build the project. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/3
* Fix GitHub action to build the project. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/8
* Migrated the Federated Language project to a repository dedicated to this project. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/15
* Remove `CHANGELOG.md`, instead use GitHub automatically generate notes for the release. by @copybara-service in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/20

## New Contributors
* @michaelreneer made their first contribution in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/2
* @copybara-service made their first contribution in https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/pull/3

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/google-parfait/federated-language/commits/v0.1.0
